abstract: China plans to nullify all guarantees local governments have provided for loans taken by their financing vehicles as concerns about credit risks on such debt increases.
snippet: China plans to nullify all guarantees local governments have provided for loans taken by their financing vehicles as concerns about credit risks on such debt increases.
lead_paragraph: China plans to nullify all guarantees local governments have provided for loans taken by their financing vehicles, a sign of increasing concern about the credit risks in such debt, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: China Said to Plan Nullifying Loan Guarantees
